full_text: In 1975, Dr. James Franklin Hyde published his own version of the #PeriodicTable. His “curled ribbon” puts silicon at the center of the table, underscoring its vital role as a building block & reflecting the element’s importance. Meet Dr. Hyde: https://t.co/EL0txqAtxX https://t.co/mbNDmy6kDU

In Life Sciences, third-quarter sales were $256M, up 11% year over year, and net income was $41M, up 37%. We expect fourth quarter and full year sales to be up mid-single digits year over year. https://t.co/QtsNi6RuUc

In Specialty Materials, third-quarter sales were $463M and net income was $92M. We expect full-year sales growth, despite a smartphone market that is down year over year, driven by adoption of new innovations. https://t.co/oTpNWUTzdK

In Environmental Technologies, third-quarter sales were $397M, up 20% year over year, and net income grew 32%, driven by strong operational performance and successful ramping of additional GPF capacity in China. https://t.co/mH7EouYbL3
In Optical Communications, third-quarter sales were $1B and net income was $127M. We continue to innovate to improve network speeds, costs, and capacity. https://t.co/yonstsyQGy
